articles.author: Yelena Dzhanova
articles.title: French President Emmanuel Macron says 'America is back' after Biden's first few months in office - Business Insider
articles.description: "It's great to have a US president who's part of the club and very willing to cooperate," Macron said at the G7 Summit on Saturday.
articles.content:
French President Emmanuel Macron on Saturday signaled his confidence in the United States as an ally with President Joe Biden at the nation's head.

articles.title: CDC investigating heart inflammation following COVID-19 vaccine - KSN-TV
articles.description: A cardiologist says these cases are very rare and represent a tiny fraction of the 130 million Americans who have been vaccinated with the Pfizer and Moderna vaccine.
